measured_by: Hurst exponent from detrended fluctuation analysis (DFAe) on resting-state EEG alpha band
justification: “To quantify LRTC, we performed detrended fluctuation analysis (DFA)… The Hurst exponent from the DFA (DFAe)… indicates the degree of the LRTC, with higher values indicating a stronger LRTC.”
construct: long-range temporal correlation / LRTC of intrinsic brain activity

measured_by: difference between N1 and HP1 final values estimated by CIPC-implemented computational model in IDM
justification: “To correlate SIV with LRTC, the difference between the N1 and HP1 values was calculated as an SIV index… the final value serves as a more detailed indicator than the chosen frequency.”
construct: superiority of intrinsically learned value / SIV

measured_by: ratio of new stimuli chosen in old-new trials of IDM
justification: “In addition to the SIV, we calculate the ratio of new stimuli chosen in old-new trials of IDM… as an additional index of the balance between intrinsically and extrinsically learned values.”
construct: balance between extrinsically and intrinsically learned values in IDM
